Module cyfight
Package fr.cyu.cyfight.event.manager

Class EventManager<T extends EventListener,​U extends EventArgs>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cyu.cyfight.event.manager.EventManager<T,​U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of the event that is managed
    U - event arguments that are required by the event, and that will be sent to the listeners
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttackerChangeEventManager, EntityUpdateStatisticsEventManager, FightEndEventManager, FightStartEventManager, GameExitRequestEventManager, ItemPickedUpEventManager, LevelChangeEventManager, LevelChangeRequestEventManager, PlayerMoveEventManager, SceneChangeRequestEventManager
    public abstract class EventManager<T extends EventListener,​U extends EventArgs>
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventManager class stores all objects that listen to a specific event, and thus is able of dispatch this event to these objects. This class is the base class for concrete event managers.
    Author:
    Mika INISAN

      List of the objects that subscribed to the event

        Subscribes an object that wants to listen to the event

      • removeListener

        public final void removeListener​(T listener)
        Stops listening to the event
        Parameters:
        listener - the object that doesn't want to listen to the event anymore

      • dispatchEvent

        public final void dispatchEvent​(java.lang.Object sender,
                                U eventArgs)
        Sends an event to all objects that have subscribed to this event
        Parameters:
        sender - the object that is emitting the event
        eventArgs - information required by the event

      • getEventType

        public abstract java.lang.reflect.Type getEventType()
        Retrieves event type.
        Returns:
        the type of the event

      • raiseEvent

        public abstract void raiseEvent​(T listener,
                                java.lang.Object sender,
                                U eventArgs)
        Sends an event to one listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - an object listening to the event
        sender - the object emitting the event
        eventArgs - information that is sent to the listener
